char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I want my old hair back.
You don't know I have no intention of ending this spell, but...

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It hasn't been too much fun for me now. I can still dance, but look at what you did to me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Congratulations, you've become a bald objecting ape.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How come you're not growing hair, like some time-traveling youkai I've seen several times?

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: With this spell, any girl can choose whatever hairstyle to look their best.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It doesn't matter. Have you developed alopecia areata or something?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Did you really think I would end your madness? You did nothing like usual.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What do you mean? I'm worrying too much. I'm already mad because you did nothing.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This incident has led to me having too much beauty than I normally have.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What do you have to say, Reimu?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm officially going to end this hair madness. It's been going on for nearly a week now.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if I am bald, you will not end this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I can now block out the sun with my head and shroud you in darkness.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm staying here and won't leave until this spell is stopped.
